text: Damjan Gojkov (; born 2 January 1998) is a Serbian footballer, who plays as a midfielder for Spartak Subotica. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|OFK Beograd |2014–15 |rowspan=2|Serbian SuperLiga ||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |2015–16 ||15||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||17||0 |- |2016–17 |Serbian First League ||21||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||22||1 |- !colspan="2"| Total !37!!1!!3!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!40!!1 |- |Bežanija (loan) |2017–18 |Serbian First League !25!!4!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!25!!4 |- |Vojvodina |2018–19 |Serbian SuperLiga !29!!1!!3!!1!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!32!!2 |- |Spartak Subotica |2019–20 |Serbian SuperLiga ||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !91!!6!!6!!1!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!97!!7 |} ==References== ==External links== * Damjan Gojkov stats at Utakmica.rs * Damjan Gojkov at Serbian First League * * * * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vrbas, Serbia Category:Association football midfielders Category:Serbian footballers Category:OFK Beograd players Category:FK Bežanija players Category:Red Star Belgrade footballers Category:FK Vojvodina players Category:Serbian First League players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players
